summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Skillax Digital Marketing Academy website. All core functionality working perfectly including backend APIs, frontend UI, admin portal, chatbot, and integrations. Major redesign features verified successfully.

Homepage loads with animated hero section and typing animation
Career Assessment modal opens with multi-step form (Name, Email, Phone, Experience, Goals)
Theme toggle (light/dark) works correctly - verified dark mode activation
Navigation works perfectly - all pages load (Home, About, Courses, Certifications, Blog, Contact)
Exactly 2 courses displayed on Courses page: Professional Digital Marketing (4 months) & Advanced AI-Powered Marketing (2 months)

Contact page form submission works with all required fields and backend integration

Admin dashboard displays statistics and leads table with export functionality
Admin logout functionality works correctly
Certification logos and grid displayed correctly (8+ certification logos found)
Career Assessment modal shows proper steps and form validation
Course durations correctly displayed (4 Months and 2 Months)
All course details and highlights properly displayed
Homepage hero section with 'Is Your Career Future-Ready?' headline working
Typing animation showing search queries like 'best digital marketing course'
Trust indicators showing 'Internship at Infopark', '15+ Certifications', 'AI-Powered Learning'
